WRITING.TITLE: [HELP] My beagle is sick
WRITING.TEXT: Today has begun awfully since both me and my mom got sick. My Mom all of a sudden notices that our dog hasnt been himself the whole day. He didnt eat and all he did was lay down. We took him to the vet and he said that he got some diseases that you get from ticks. He said that the thing we put on his skin that the vendor told us was gonna last six months was a complete lie and only lasted a month or two. He had two shots, he is getting his blood taken tommorow. He had fever for the majority of the day, his ears are swollen but now he finally ate and started to get his activity up a bit. I am incredibly worried but do I have reason to be, or is it all just gonna be fine, has someone else had simmilar experiences?

Yeah that makes sense, I read about premium hands somewhere, is that what you mean? And about Dnegs, I get your point, but if he can do it i am pretty sure I can too. After all he only has 6 bracelets and my aunt gave me my ninth one for christmass

Yeah, but I put him on AQ, cause of the preflop raise. KQ came to mind aswell, figured he would bet the pocket Queens on the flop and/or turn if he had them, and QJ/Q10 and any less he would fold on the bet on the flop. However now that I think about it a queen plus a flopped pair seems really plausible, but luck was on my side.

Yeah sure, what literature do you recommend? And in reference to turn and river bets, I dont really know, its just that min bettin will sometimes earn my weak hand a fold, or if they are a nit, my mediocre hand atleast two or three big blinds, so I can atleast pickup something without scaring them off.

Since Dnegs is the player I watch the most, he said somewhere that every flop is worth seeing, and sometimes lines like that stay in my head and shape my actions subconsciously. Same goes for "Suited trash is still trash"

WRITING.TITLE: [Hand Analysis] How would you play this hand?
WRITING.TEXT: Im a relatively new poker player so I dont know how to properly write this so I will do my best. I play micro stakes, and while not big money it gives me a start and an intro into the world of poker. Anyway .02/.04 stakes Hero has 3.83 Villain 5.23 Hero is UTG +1 Villain is UTG +2 Hero has 8dKs BB, SB and hero limp in, Villain raises 5BB, everyone folds, Hero calls Flop is 2d 8c 5h Hero bets .23, Villain calls Turn 7h Hero bets the min, V calls River Qd, Hero bets the min, V raises to .88, Hero???? I ended up calling cause I couldnt put him on AQ dont know why, since he did raise pre but I had a hunch , and ended up winning the pot, he had AhJs, so I won the pot.

No he is not. He has been really good for like a third of a normal NBA season, and if anything the numbers should be his strong suit, since his defence is pretty bad, so no defensive presence that is overlooked by stats such as Gobert.
